'''Nature and Wisdom''' is an [[Event Card]] in [[Genius Invokation TCG]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* After switching cards in the player's hand with this card's effect, the game will indicate that it is the Action Phase. This card does not start an additional Action Phase, nor does it trigger cards that activate when Action Phase begins. 

==Story==
